properties.entry: SELECT CALL_NO, TOPIC, BOOK_NAME, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, LOC, AVAIL, NVL(TO_CHAR(DUE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'-') DUE_DATE FROM TB_BOOKS JOIN TB_TOPIC USING (TOPIC_CODE) JOIN TB_LOCATION USING (LOC_CODE) JOIN TB_AVAILABILITY USING (AVAIL_CODE) WHERE BOOK_NAME = ? OR AUTHOR = ? OR PUBLISHER = ?

SELECT BOOK_NO, CALL_NO, TOPIC, BOOK_NAME, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, LOC, AVAIL, NVL(TO_CHAR(DUE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'-') DUE_DATE FROM TB_BOOKS JOIN TB_TOPIC USING (TOPIC_CODE) JOIN TB_LOCATION USING (LOC_CODE) JOIN TB_AVAILABILITY USING (AVAIL_CODE)

SELECT REC_NO, BOOK_NO, REC.CALL_NO, BOOK_NAME, USER_NO, USER_NAME, TO_CHAR(LENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') LENT_DATE, TO_CHAR(REC.DUE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DUE_DATE, NVL(TO_CHAR(RETURN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '-') RETURN_DATE FROM TB_LENT_RECORD REC JOIN TB_BOOKS USING(BOOK_NO) JOIN TB_USER USING(USER_NO) WHERE SYSDATE > REC.DUE_DATE AND RETURN_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY REC_NO DESC

SELECT CALL_NO, TOPIC, BOOK_NAME, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, LOC, AVAIL, NVL(TO_CHAR(DUE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'-') DUE_DATE FROM TB_BOOKS JOIN TB_TOPIC USING (TOPIC_CODE) JOIN TB_LOCATION USING (LOC_CODE) JOIN TB_AVAILABILITY USING (AVAIL_CODE) WHERE CALL_NO = ?
